fr.zcraft.quartzteams

Class QuartzTeams

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.core.QuartzComponent
      • fr.zcraft.quartzteams.QuartzTeams
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class QuartzTeams
extends fr.zcraft.quartzlib.core.QuartzComponent
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    This component must be registered inside your project to use teams.

    T is your own QuartzTeam subclass.

      • chatManager

        public static QuartzTeamsChatManager chatManager()
        Returns:
        The zTeams chat manager (to handle private teams chats).

      • setPermissionsChecker

        public static void setPermissionsChecker(PermissionsChecker permissionsChecker)
        Sets the permissions checker used to grant access to commands or GUIs actions to players.

        If not set, a default op-based permissions checker is used, granting permissions to operators or to any player for non-administrative actions.

        Parameters:
        permissionsChecker - The permissions checker to use.

        public void registerTeam(QuartzTeam team)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Registers a new team.
        Parameters:
        team - The team.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if duplicated teams are disabled and there is another team with the same name.
